name: Late Night Mop
storyline:
Story
You are requested to do a quick clean up, late at night by one of your clients who needs the house ready in the morning and, once you get into the house, strange things start happening.
summary:
Late Night Mop is a haunted house cleaning simulator.
You are requested to do a quick clean up, late at night by one of your clients who needs the house ready in the morning and, once you get into the house, strange things start happening.

videos.title: I made a Haunted House Cleaning Simulator
